591040.name: The Cooking Game Original Soundtracks
591040.description:
An original soundtrack by Jobbe 3.14 Sounddesign by Davide Castagnone & Edoardo Nicodemo created for The Cooking Game.
Great for when you want inspiration when cooking your own delicious dishes right at home, or relax while thinking of delicious noodles.
Includes high quality MP3 versions.

NOTE: Once you purchased and installed the game, the soundtrack can be accessed inside the game folder.


1. American Fast Food Theme Music (02:58)
2. Arabic Restaurant Theme Music (01:58)
3. Chinese Restaurant Theme Music (03:19)
4. Italian Restaurant Theme Music (03:04)
5. Cake Shop Theme Music (03:05)
6. Japanese Restaurant Theme Music (03:11)
7. Mexican Restaurant Theme Music (02:05)
8. Indian Restaurant Theme Music (02:14)
9. Casino Theme Music (00:15)
10. Menu Theme Music (03:51)
591040.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 韩语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 泰语, 繁体中文, 乌克兰语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
